titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Daniel C. Wickliffe
CWG7661

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL.
KENTUCKY.
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteers,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE,
Frankfort, Aug 20 1862.
Hon:
D. C. Wickliffe
Sec: State
Sir

I have issued & delivered the following Commissions viz:
Robert W. Compton Q. Master date Aug 20. 1862
James A. Dawson Adjutant " " " "
Tho. H. Moore 2d Lieut " " " "
Ezra H. Kilpatrick 2d Lieut " " " "
David A. Harvey 1st Lieut " " 16 "
John Walls 1st Lieut " " 12 "
Luther Hale 2d Lieut " " " "
John T. Fleming Surgeon " " 20 "

Over
Lieut: Davis A. Harvey Pro: date Com: Octo. 8. 1861
Lieut: John Wall Pro: " " Dec 12, 1861
Lieut: Charles W. Huffaker resig: " " Oct 28, 1861

I am
Resply
Johhn W. Finnell
Adjt Genl.
